## toggleNotificationReadStatus variable

Function that toggles notifications read status If notificationIds is not passed, all the notifications of the user gets their status toggled

**Signature:**

```typescript
toggleNotificationReadStatus: (userId: Types.ObjectId, isRead: boolean, notificationIds?: Types.ObjectId[]) => Promise<void>
```
